sentences: David Binney (born August 2, 1961) is an American alto saxophonist and composer.
Binney was born in Miami, Florida, and was raised in Carpinteria, California.
He took saxophone lessons in Los Angeles.
When he was nineteen, he moved to New York City and studied with saxophonists George Coleman, Dave Liebman, and Phil Woods.

In the Paint with Alan Ferber (Posi-Tone, 2009)
Zinc City with Manuel Engel (Metonic, 2018)With Lan Xang

Virgil Moorefield, Distractions on the Way to the King's Party (Cuneiform, 1994)
